translations.name: De Almeida Bible
translations.description: Almeida Revista e Corrigida (1898, 1969, 1995, 2009). The ARC which is a Portuguese translation of The King James Version of the Bible, features classical language and falls on the formal equivalence category. Almeida sought to reproduce the text translated the formal aspects of the biblical text in its original languages (Hebrew, Aramaic, and Greek). This edition incorporates the expected changes in spelling that the Portuguese language has undergone since 1681.
